com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BondRetryFilter.DefaultBondRetryFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BondRetryFilter.DefaultBondRetryFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BondRetryFilter, GenericListener_T<BondRetryFilter.RetryEvent,BondRetryFilter.Please>
    Enclosing interface:
    BondRetryFilter

    public static class BondRetryFilter.DefaultBondRetryFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements BondRetryFilter
    The default BondRetryFilter that SweetBlue uses. Feel free to instantiate this with your own number of retry attempts, See BondRetryFilter.DefaultBondRetryFilter#DefaultBondRetryFilter(int), or to provide custom logic on when to retry the bond attempt, in which case you should override the BondRetryFilter.DefaultBondRetryFilter#onEvent(RetryEvent) method. This will retry the bond only if the bond attempt was direct, in that BleDevice.bond(BleDevice.BondListener), or BleDevice.bond() was called, and if we think it's a possible retry situation. See BondRetryFilter.RetryEvent.possibleRetry().

      Constructor which allows you to specify the maximum number of bond retry attempts before giving up.
